attributes.action: Cancel or drastically shorten all Parliamentary recesses due to Brexit crisis
attributes.background: Irrespective of partisan views on Brexit, the entire process has become an uncontrolled, chaotic mess. Yet the government has proposed starting summer recess early, in the middle of key debates on Customs and Trade. Parliament needs more time to debate & work through these issues, & more - not less.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225083
